desc.p: This token helper applies if the first char is zero
desc.pre: The number part must be preceded by (case matters) "0r16" for hexidecimal, meaning the number is in hex "0r10" for decimal "0r2" for binary, meaning the number is in binary or "0r" and any radix in between the number part is just (case matters) "n" [ Sign ] Integer
